title: Putumayo Presents - World Yoga (2012)
description:
PUTUMAYO PRESENTS WORLD YOGA



Artist: Various Artists
Album: Putumayo Presents World Yoga
Released: 2012
Genres: World Music, Lounge, Meditation, Relaxation
Format: mp3

__________________________________________________________________________


1 Sona Jobarteh - Reflections - (Gambia)

2 Quentin Dujardin - 1977 - (Belgium)

3 Deva Premal & Miten - Om Asatoma - (Germany)

4 Mirabai Ceiba - Ong Namo (Putumayo Version) - (United States)

5 DJ Drez - Floating Sweetness - (United States)

6 9Bach - Cariad Cyntaf - (United Kingdom)

7 Sona Jobarteh - Saya - (Gambia)

8 Stevin McNamara - Moon Magic (Chandra) (Part 2 Gat) - (South Africa)

9 Balla Tounkara - Yarabi - (Mali)

10 Sara Tavares - Exala - (Portugal)

11 Sean Johnson & The Wild Lotus Band - Ramachandra - (United States)

12 Ara Dinkjian - Offering - (Armenia)

13 Geoffrey Oryema - Makambo - (Uganda)

14 Kelsang Chukie Tethong - A Prayer to Dispel Sickness and Harms - (Nepal)

15 Tiny Island - Le Valse Petit - (Sweden)

__________________________________________________________________________


Take a relaxing journey around the world with these soothing songs from Mali to Nepal and beyond. --Putumayo.com

Drawing on contemplative sounds from Wales to Tibet and Armenia to Uganda, this collection leads listeners to deeper relaxation and connection with life. With an engaging balance of more traditional yoga sounds mantra-based pieces with Indian elements and unexpected acoustic gems from Africa and beyond, World Yoga reflects the practice s planetary impact and grace.
The diversity of World Yoga reflects yoga's ability to transcend borders and cultural barriers, to move people of different backgrounds. The music promises to turn a daily commute or next round of yoga practice into a meditative yet energizing experience.(Editorial Reviews)

__________________________________________________________________________


Enjoy!
